title: SECLI TO "SET" CLIENTS STATEMENTS REPORTING FREQUENCY TO INITIAL VALUES FOR ALL MIGRATED CLIENTS

task_list.instruction_title:
\"SECLI to “set” the Clients Statements reporting frequency to initial value for all migrated clients. 
For CUTOVER - To be executed after the migration, during 1st week of May 2022.
For DR - To be executed in the week after the migration and CSD & P&C is complete.\"
